definition: to hold/to seize/to catch/to apprehend/to take/(used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: And Manasseh his son succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 他儿子玛拿西接续他作王。

sentences.english: So Manasseh and Ephraim, the descendants of Joseph, received their inheritance.
sentences.chinese: 约瑟的儿子玛拿西，以法莲就得了他们的地业。

sentences.english: So he took his two sons Manasseh and Ephraim along with him.
sentences.chinese: 他就带着两个儿子玛拿西和以法莲同去。
玛拿西，把地毯放在那儿。

sentences.english: Manasseh rested with his fathers and was buried in his palace garden, the garden of Uzza.
sentences.chinese: 玛拿西与他列祖同睡，葬在自己宫院乌撒的园内。

sentences.english: And by the border of Manasseh, from the east side unto the west side, a portion for Ephraim.
sentences.chinese: 挨着玛拿西的地界，从东到西，是以法莲的一分。

sentences.english: Between Ahaz and Manasseh there was 29-year reign of King Hezekiah.
sentences.chinese: 在亚哈斯和玛拿西之间，希西家作王共29年。

sentences.english: And over the host of the tribe of the children of Manasseh was Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur.
sentences.chinese: 统领玛拿西支派军队的是比大蓿的儿子迦玛列。

sentences.english: and Eliab son of Helon was over the division of the tribe of Zebulun.
sentences.chinese: 统领玛拿西支派军队的是比大蓿的儿子迦玛列。

sentences.english: Then Manasseh knew that the Lord is God.
sentences.chinese: 玛拿西这才知道惟独耶和华是神。

sentences.english: These are the other male descendants of Manasseh son of Joseph by their clans.
sentences.chinese: 这些按着宗族，都是约瑟儿子玛拿西子孙的男丁。

sentences.english: So he took his two sons (A)Manasseh and Ephraim with him.
sentences.chinese: 他就带著两个儿子玛拿西和以法莲同去。

sentences.english: Manasseh rested with his fathers and was buried in his palace.
sentences.chinese: 玛拿西与他列祖同睡，葬在自己的宫院里。

sentences.english: And by the border of Naphtali, from the east side unto the west side, a portion for Manasseh.
sentences.chinese: 挨着拿弗他利的地界，从东到西，是玛拿西的一分。

sentences.english: He was murdered by King Hezekiah's son King Manasseh.
sentences.chinese: 他被西家王的儿子玛拿西杀害。

sentences.english: So the children of Joseph, Manasseh and Ephraim, took their inheritance.
sentences.chinese: 约瑟的儿子玛拿西，以法莲就得了他们的地业。

definition: Jephthah (Hebrew: Yiftach) son of Gilead, Judges 11-foll.
Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
Ahab (9th c. BC), King of Israel, son of Omri and husband of Jezebel, prominent figure in 1 Kings 16-22
Hezekiah or Ezekias (740-687 BC), twelfth king of Judah (Judaism)
